revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ARC Wireless |model=FreeStation 5 |upc=609132712753 |asin=B007GOAIPU;GB; |est_release_date=2012 |fcc_date=10/06/2011 |is_manuf=No |type=CPE, access point |fcc_id=Z2B-AFM1, Z2B-AFM2, Z9W-CM1 |pwr_v=24 |pwr_amp=0.7 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050 |cpu1_cspeed=320 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640ETTI-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9825G6JH-61 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module=8devices Carambola |wi1_module_if=SIP (on-board) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module=ARCFlex AFM2 |wi2_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT3572 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;Terminus;FE1.1;LG3S945A6410;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink v3.3; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.21.7; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, LEDE Project, |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=arcweb |default_ssid_regex=^arcweb$, |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=A8:87:ED |oui_eth=A8:87:ED }} {{TagLine|ARCFlex 5GHz 300Mbps MIMO CPE}} :[http://www.antennas.com/freestation/ Product page]
The FCC IDs for this device are likely Z2B-AFM1 (RT3050 board) :and Z2B-AFM2 (RT3572 module). *Dual Radio - 2.4GHz AP (21dBi), 5GHz MIMO CPE (25dBi) w/ 18dBi antenna *802.11bgn (150Mbps), 802.11an (300Mbps), all outdoor enclosure *POE Passthrough up to 24V, polarity independent The same hardware is likely used for the FreeStation 2.
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/arc/freestation On the OpenWrt wiki] :MX29LV640ETTI-70G Flash in the RT3050 board filing. :Assumed A8:87:ED OUI...
Per [http://www.antennas.com/wiki/index.php?title=ARCFlex_Quick_Install_Guides#Default_Settings ARC Wireless' wiki]... *the default SSID is '''arcweb''' (for both radios?) *the default IP is apparently 10.100.100.49 if connected via the installer network :or 192.168.10.1 if connected via private wireless or by Ethernet *the default password for the UI and telnet are admin/admin and user/user *PoE input port is eth0, output is eth1 (but PoE passthrough is disabled by default)
==Images== <gallery caption="[[User:RayKnight|RayKnight]]'s unit"> File:Freestation5.JPG File:Freestation5-USBWiFi.JPG File:Freestation5-Antenna.JPG </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
